mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Tod, David to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tod, David
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling May 8 1863. By Telegraph from Columbus 8 1863. I have just sent a dispatch to your care which you are at liberty to open. My Adjt Genl Hill is at Marietta organizing military forces communicate with him if necessary David Tod Gov 31D83pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Tod, David
Columbus, Ohio
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
